title: Is a person’s mind capable of telepathy? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know about information-sharing, but this video purports to show how group meditation can enhance the meditation practice of each participant: It seems to me that this would be required for telepathy to be real, but I am not convinced that the phenomenon being demonstrated is real. If THAT isn’t real, I see no possible way that telepathy can be real. Even if the group meditation is real, that’s still not telepathy but it seems that you can’t have one without the other.
